price: (Saa mframa no) sεe biribiara pasaa wͻ ne Wura Nyankopͻn ahyεdeε mu. Enti adeε kyeeε no wonhunu hwee gyesε wͻn asetena mu. Saa na Yɛtua nnebͻnefoͻ no so ka.
arabic: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَيۡءِۭ بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصۡبَحُواْ لَا يُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: tudammiru kulla shayin bi-amri rabbihā fa-aṣbaḥū lā yurā illā masākinuhum kadhālika najzī al-qawma al-muj'rimīna
